arguments.title: GDPR DSAR Timeline Update – Action Required
arguments.body:
## Summary
The GDPR amendment reduces the DSAR response window to **15 days** (effective 2024‑03‑01).

## Current SLA
Your internal ticketing SLA resolves DSAR tickets within **48 hours**, which is stricter than the legal requirement.

## Recommendation
- Verify that the 48‑hour process is consistently applied and documented.
- Update the internal compliance matrix to reference the new 15‑day statutory deadline.
- Communicate the change to the data‑privacy team.

*Record ID: rec-98765*
